article_title: British national among aid workers killed in Gaza, charity says.
sentence: British  national  among  aid  workers  killed  in  Gaza,  charity  says.

article_title: British national among aid workers killed in Gaza, charity says.
sentence: At  least  seven  aid  workers,  mostly  foreign  nationals,  have  been  killed  in  an  air  strike  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  food  charity  World  Central  Kitchen.

article_title: British national among aid workers killed in Gaza, charity says.
sentence: The  US  based-charity  says  a  British  national  is  among  the  dead  as  are  nationalities  from  Poland,  Australia  as  well  as  a  US-Canada  dual  citizen  and  a  Palestinian.
